      • dbgCheckNdefRecordContent

        protected void dbgCheckNdefRecordContent(byte[] originalPayload)
        This function is ONLY USED FOR DEBUG. It checks that the payload of this NDEF record is identical to the original NDEFRecord payload. It allows to check that payload parsing and serialization are correct.
        Parameters:
        originalPayload -
